title: The Vital Abyss
description:
From New York Times bestselling author James S.A. Corey...Somewhere in the vast expanse of space, a group of prisoners lives in permanent captivity.The only company they have is each other and the Belters who guard them. The only stories they know are the triumphs and crimes that brought them there. The only future they see is an empty life in an enormous room.And then the man from Mars came along . . .Set in the hard-scrabble solar system of the Expanse, The Vital Abyss deepens James S. A. Corey's acclaimed series.The Expanse (soon to be a major Syfy Channel television series)Leviathan WakesCaliban's WarAbaddon's GateCibola BurnNemesis GamesComing  Babylon's Ashes

The Expanse Short Fiction The Butcher of Anderson StationGods of RiskThe ChurnDrive
author: James S.A. Corey
